template: I've watched the following movies in the past in order:
Now there are 20 candidate movies that I can watch next:
In order for you to make better recommendations, I will give you some movies that I may be interested in in the candidate list according to my history, and ranked in descending order. They are:
Please rank the 20 candidate movies by measuring the possibilities that I would like to watch next most, according to my watching history and the interested movies. Please think step by step.
Your output is only allowed to be a rerank of the candidate list. Do not add movies out of the candidate list.
Please give the results as JSON array (from highest to lowest priority, movie names only):
